landing.title: A simple and anonymous feedback solution
landing.property_simple_description: Our service is easy to use and both desktop and mobile friendly. Best of all, it's free!
landing.property_anonymous_description: As a submitter, you're fully anonymous. No IP logging, "logins", "verifications", or other identity-revealing gimmicks.
landing.property_powerful_description: Collect, publish, edit, and delete submissions with one click, and customize your page's submission portal with our many options.
